title: Smart Data models - IssueReporting schema
description: A Data Model for citizen issues, reports and feedbacks.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be IssueReporting

comments.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. User comments corresponding to this observation.

wardId.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Ward ID of the entity corresponding to this observation.

departmentId.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Unique ID or code associated with the department which is associated with the service or the issue corresponding to this observation.

title.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The title assigned to the issue, report or feedback corresponding to this observation.

subCategoryCode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Unique identifier for the sub-category corresponding to the issue reported.

titleCode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The code assigned to the title corresponding to this observation.

subCategory.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The sub-category name corresponding to the issue that has been reported.

reportId.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Unique ID assigned for the issue or report or feedback or transaction corresponding to this observation.

categoryCode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Unique identifier for the category corresponding to the issue reported.

category.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The category name corresponding to the issue that has been reported.

landmark.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A physical distinguishing feature on land that marks a locality or a place.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Last reported time of observation.

mediaURL.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. URL providing further information of any image(s) or media of the complaint or place.

resolutionStatus.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Status of the issue that was reported in terms of resolution or the actions taken on it. Could be Open, Assigned, InProgress, Unassigned, Closed
